items.title: Fast-er food: A productivity surge at U.S. restaurants
items.description: A new study finds that after decades of stagnation, fast-food and other restaurants finally saw a surge in productivity.

items.title: At 83, Martha Stewart celebrates gardening with her 101st book
items.description: Martha Stewart talks gardening, wanting to be "one of the girls" and her 101st book with NPR Morning Edition host Michel Martin.
